intro: Yulania urceolata, commonly known as the cup-shaped chrysanthemum, is a flowering plant native to China. It is characterized by its unique, urn-shaped inflorescence, which gives it its common name. The plant produces showy, brightly colored flowers in shades of yellow, orange, and red. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for ornamental gardening. Yulania urceolata is a member of the Asteraceae family, which includes many other flowering plants known for their composite flower heads.
